heading: Capitation payments
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 1 

Capitation payments 

Description 

Amount 

(2) 

(3) 

Annual Capitation Fee per Child Patient under the age 
of 6 on the GP’s panel, which includes two periodic 
assessments, one at age 2 and one at age 5. 

€125.00 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [459] 3 

Annual Capitation Fee per Child Patient aged 6 to 7 
years 

€100.00 

Initial Asthma diagnosis and registration after the 
Child Patient reaches the age of 2 years 

€50.00 

Enhanced capitation in year 1 post registration of 
Child Patients with Asthma (subject to submission of 
annual dataset return) 

€90.00 

Enhanced capitation for care of Child Patients with 
Asthma for each subsequent year up to and including 
the age of 7 years (subject to submission of annual 
dataset return) 

€45.00

The Minister for Public Expenditure and Reform consents to the making of the 
foregoing Regulations. 

Signed by the minister for Public Expenditure and Reform, 

13 September, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 September, 2023. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: 1970 (No. 1 of 1970), prior to the making of these regulations, engaged in such
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend payments and eligibility in respect of services 
rendered by general practitioners under the agreement for the provision of 
services to children.
